query:
SELECT m.id, m.senderId, m.recipientId, m.content, m.read, m.createdAt,
       s.name as senderName, s.role as senderRole,
       r.name as recipientName, r.role as recipientRole
FROM messages m
LEFT JOIN users s ON m.senderId = s.id
LEFT JOIN users r ON m.recipientId = r.id
ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 20;
